name: Rocket Fighters
description:
Be the last one standing by eliminating other players using a direct hit or pushing them off the arena! The environment is fully destructible, which opens up for intense, high action gameplay!

A 4 player destruction frenzy, be the last man standing to win! This is the Ultimate Arena FPS.

NOTE: This game is local multiplayer only. You will need controllers to be able to play this game. Singleplayer coming soon (2 weeks)!
